entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 1:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
